excerpt.rendered: Twitter’s expanding its suite of offerings for businesses with a new feature called Location Spotlight for professional accounts, the company announced on Tuesday. title.rendered: Instacart renames its subscription service to Instacart+, adds new family shopping features

excerpt.rendered: Instacart announced today that it’s introducing Instacart+, a revamped version of its subscription service previously called Instacart Express. title.rendered: Microsoft finally fixes Windows zero-day flaw exploited by state-backed hackers

excerpt.rendered: Microsoft has finally released a fix for “Follina,” a zero-day vulnerability in Windows that’s being actively exploited by state-backed hackers. title.rendered: Fountain raises $100M to expand its applicant tracking system

excerpt.rendered: The “Great Resignation,” the trend where workers are leaving their jobs at a higher-than-usual rate, is continuing unabated. title.rendered: Edtech company Pok Pok raises $3M to expand its digital play experiences for kids

excerpt.rendered: Pok Pok, a Toronto-based edtech company, has announced that it raised $3 million in seed funding to expand its play-based learning experiences for kids. title.rendered: YouTube Shorts tops 1.5B logged-in users monthly users, touted as feeder to long-form content

excerpt.rendered: In an effort to present itself as a viable competitor to the reigning short-form video platform TikTok, YouTube announced today its rival service YouTube Shorts is now being watched by over 1.5 billion logged-in users every month, less than two years after its launch. By comparison, TikTok announced 1 billion monthly users in September 2021. […]

title.rendered: Postscript takes in $65M so Shopify merchants can send more personalized texts to customers

excerpt.rendered: Black Friday is typically a big SMS day, but Memorial Day was the company’s largest SMS sending day this year with between 30 and 40 million texts sent.

title.rendered: AI-powered parking platform Metropolis bags $167M

title.rendered: Cloudflare outage hits Discord, GitLab and other services in India

excerpt.rendered: A Cloudflare outage in the India region that began over an hour ago has caused several services including Discord, online insurer Acko, GitLab and SaaS platform OSlash to face performance issues in the country, users say. Users also reported issues accessing Shopify, Udemy, Canva and Zerodha, according to DownDetector, a crowdsourced web monitoring tool that […]
